alert.note: Alert for Mendocino Coast; Northeastern Mendocino Interior; Northern Humboldt Coast; Northern Lake County; Northern Trinity; Northwestern Mendocino Interior; Southeastern Mendocino Interior; Southern Lake County; Southern Trinity; Southwestern Mendocino Interior (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 08 at 12:38PM PST until January 09 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Eureka
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 AM PST MONDAY... * WHAT...Southeast winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. Strongest winds across exposed ridges and coastal headlands. * WHERE...Portions of northwest California. * WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to 10 AM PST Monday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
